original_text: So he said to Jether his firstborn, “Rise and kill them!” But the young man did not draw his sword, for he was afraid, because he was still a young man.
korean_text: 그의 맏아들 여델에게 이르되 일어나 그들을 죽이라 하였으나 그 소년이 그의 칼을 빼지 못하였으니 이는 아직 어려서 두려워함이었더라

sentences.original_text: So he said to Jether his firstborn,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 자기 장자 여델에게 말하였으되,

sentences.original_text: But the young man did not draw his sword,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 청년은 칼을 뽑지 아니하였으니,

sentences.original_text: because he was still a young man.
